[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Max balance] If balance reaches u64::MAX, can subsequent deposits silently fail without error, causing loss of deposited funds? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Zero initialization] Can initializing ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource with balance=0 cause division-by-zero errors in reward distribution calculations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Max balance limit] With max_value=u64::MAX, are there off-by-one errors where balance=u64::MAX-1 is allowed but u64::MAX triggers overflow protection? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: metadata] [Zero address] Can metadata be set to AccountAddress::ZERO, causing dereferencing errors when accessing fungible asset properties? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: metadata] [System address] Can an attacker set metadata to a system-reserved address (0x1, 0x2, etc.) to gain elevated privileges over the fungible store? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: metadata] [Self-reference] Can metadata point to the store's own address, creating a circular reference that causes infinite loops in asset property lookups? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: metadata] [Address reuse] If two stores share the same metadata address, can operations on one store inadvertently affect the other, violating isolation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: frozen] [Toggle attack] Can the frozen flag be toggled rapidly between true/false in consecutive transactions to confuse access control checks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: frozen] [Partial freeze] Can funds be withdrawn from a frozen store during the transaction that sets frozen=true, exploiting TOCTOU vulnerability? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: frozen] [Freeze bypass via migration] During migration from coin to fungible asset, can the frozen state be lost, unfreezing previously frozen accounts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Field: frozen] [Metadata freeze override] If store.frozen=false but metadata indicates global freeze, which takes precedence? Can this ambiguity enable withdrawals? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Double free] In unsafe code paths, can FungibleStoreResource be freed twice, corrupting memory and potentially allowing arbitrary code execution? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Use after free] Can a FungibleStoreResource reference be used after the underlying resource is destroyed in Move VM, causing memory corruption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Aggregator lifetime] If AggregatorResource is destroyed while ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource references it, can this cause use-after-free? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Non-deterministic hash] If FungibleStoreResource hashing is non-deterministic (e.g., due to memory layout), can this cause state root divergence across validators? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Serialization order] Does BCS serialization maintain consistent field ordering (metadata, balance, frozen)? Can reordering cause consensus failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Aggregator determinism] Are AggregatorResource operations deterministic across all validators, or can concurrent updates produce different final values? (Critical)
